entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 except minus 12 in low lying areas. POP 40%
